# Class AbstractComponent`Abstract`

Abstract base class for all DSL components.

Provides common functionality such as ID generation and conversion to a graph configuration component.

#### Hierarchy ([View Summary](/hierarchy#graph/dsl/components/abstract_component.AbstractComponent))

  * AbstractComponent
    * [MCPClientComponent](./graph_dsl_components_mcp_client_component.MCPClientComponent)
    * [RemoteEmbedderComponent](./graph_dsl_components_remote_embedder_component.RemoteEmbedderComponent)
    * [RemoteKnowledgeComponent](./graph_dsl_components_remote_knowledge_component.RemoteKnowledgeComponent)
    * [RemoteLLMComponent](./graph_dsl_components_remote_llm_component.RemoteLLMComponent)
    * [RemoteSTTComponent](./graph_dsl_components_remote_stt_component.RemoteSTTComponent)
    * [RemoteTTSComponent](./graph_dsl_components_remote_tts_component.RemoteTTSComponent)

### [TO_GRAPH_CONFIG_COMPONENT]

  * "[TO_GRAPH_CONFIG_COMPONENT]"(): [Component](/interfaces/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Component)

Converts this DSL component to a serializable graph configuration component.

### `Protected` `Abstract`toGraphConfigComponent

  * toGraphConfigComponent(): [Component](/interfaces/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Component)

Implemented by subclasses to provide their graph configuration representation.
